akn:content.akn:p: A person who originates an entitlement order to a securities intermediary warrants to the securities intermediary that:

A person who delivers a security certificate to a securities intermediary for credit to a securities account or originates an instruction with respect to an uncertificated security directing that the uncertificated security be credited to a securities account makes to the securities intermediary the warranties specified in ยง 28:8-108(a) or (b).

If a securities intermediary delivers a security certificate to its entitlement holder or causes its entitlement holder to be registered as the owner of an uncertificated security, the securities intermediary makes to the entitlement holder the warranties specified in ยง 28:8-108(a) or (b).
